C1 [ T often passive ] to say what the price of something is: The car is priced at £28,000. There is a lack of reasonably priced housing for rent.
[ T ] to discover how much something costs: We went around all the travel agents pricing the different tours.
More examplesFewer examplescompetitively priced goodsThe company makes and retails moderately priced sportswear.I bought a reasonably priced radio.We've been pricing new kitchens.I think you need to price things slightly lower if you want to get rid of them quickly.
